data.text:
@nypost This dude is another fake. People are so stupid when it comes to the people they want leading them.
This dude is another William Wilhelm Jr. Only in black face!
@nypost If someone from NJ, CT or PA worked on Wall Street, and came in from those states to do his/her job, they would have to be vaccinated just like NYers. So why not NBA players?

@nypost Kyrie is an idiot for a lot of reasons...(cough cough...flat Earth), but it is absolutely ABSURD that unvaccinated players on other teams can play when they are in the city to face the Nets or Knicks. It shows favoritism is already being given.
@nypost I bought Kyries jersey for free from sportsbets to show support for his bravery
@nypost Spineless politician. Shouldâ€™ve voted for Sliwa.
@nypost Eric De Blasio is a fool.
@Truuee_American @nypost The city is soaked in money. And we can't move too fast in opening up everything in the city. But I believe we'll be good by the summer.
